name: Peony Cloud
description:
Cylinder Shade - 15cm diameter 20cm height (approx 6" x 8")

Suitable as a pendant or on a base. Ideal as bedside lamps. 

The paper used to make this shade is hand stencil dyed Katazome-Shi paper from Japan, the finished edges are hand rolled. The paper is strong, durable and printed with long lasting dyes and features a light and playful design of flowers. The background is a neutral off white printed with red, blue, mustard yellow, mid green, orange and brown. Although bold, the paper and dyes have a natural quality.

Traditional Kimono printing techniques are used to make this hand stencil dyed paper. True craftsmanship is required to create intricate paper stencils cut out with various tools. A resist paste is applied to the base paper and then colour, the stencil moved and the process is repeated to build up the pattern. This a highly labour intensive process that results in a paper that has timeless appeal and an unmissable look of a print made by hand

The shade is handmade has one seam and handrolled edges.

name: Red Wheel Flowers
description:
Medium Drum Shade 25cm Diameter x 20cm Height

Suitable as a pendant shade or for use on a base.

Warm bright red contrasting with cream and black and a striking pattern are a winning combination for a unique and joyful shade.

Strong, durable paper printed with long lasting dyes have been used to make this paper that features a striking pattern of red flowers. The pattern is uniformed but not laid out in an exact geometric form giving it a distinct and hand crafted quality.

The paper used to make this shade is hand stencil dyed Katazome-Shi paper from Japan, the finished edges are hand rolled. Traditional Kimono printing techniques are used to make this hand stencil dyed paper. True craftsmanship is required to create intricate paper stencils cut out with various tools. A resist paste is applied to the base paper and then colour, the stencil moved and the process is repeated to build up the pattern. This a highly labour intensive process that results in a paper that has timeless appeal and an unmissable look of a print made by hand

name: Romany Flowers
description:
NEW SIZE A large drum shade 45cm diameter x 25cm height. (17.7" x 8")

Stunning Chiyogami paper from Japan. This design of red and pink flowers on a slatey blue background has been screen printed in layers on washi paper. When the light shines it takes on a more orangey glow. Equally at home in a traditional and contemporary setting.

Made using Chiyogami Paper from Japan. Each sheet is hand silk-screen printed requiring a separate screen that is hand-registered for each colour that appears in a pattern. The technique gives the paper a unique quality, you can sometimes feel and see the different layers of print giving added depth to the pattern.

The inks used on these papers are very light fast and the vibrant colours will last, the paper is also very durable. The shade is made from two pieces of paper and therfore has 2 seams. The shade has hand rolled edges.

Please contact me if you are interested in a custom order for a different size.


N.B Shipping:
Unfortunately due to the size of this large shade shipping works out fairly expensive if you live outside Europe. Although light in weight the price reflects cargo space. I have done my best to subsidise the prices, if you have any queries regarding shipping please email me.

name: Gold on Black
description:
Large Drum Shade
40cm diameter x 20cm high     (15.7" x 8")


Stunning Chiyogami paper from Japan.  This exotic pattern of finely drawn flowers has been hand screen printed using gold ink on black washi paper.  

The shade has two seams and hand rolled edges.

The production methods to make and print this paper are environmentally sound.

Suggested Use:

- Statement Pendant Shade in a living room, dining room or bedroom
- Statement Floor Lamp

name: Golden Mountains
description:
Medium Drum Shade 25cm Diameter x 20cm Height
MADE TO ORDER

Made using Chiyogami Paper from Japan. Each sheet is hand silk-screen printed requiring a separate screen that is hand-registered for each colour that appears in a pattern. The technique gives the paper a unique quality, you can sometimes feel and see the different layers of print giving added depth to the pattern.

The pattern of this paper is a series of marks in pale chalky blue/grey and skintone pink with specs of red and white on a background of yellow gold. The pattern is uniformed but not laid out in an exact geometric form giving it a distinct and unusual quality. When lit the shade gives a warm brown glow with the detailed marks creating subtle interest.(last two photos are when lit)

If an un-usual yet subtle design is what you are after with an earthy, natural quality, this paper design and shade would be perfect as a lamp in any room.

Please contact me if you are interested in a custom made shade in another size.

name: Blossom & Gold
description:
A large drum shade 40cm diameter x 20cm high     (15.7" x 8")
MADE TO ORDER

A one off design using a plain pale gold paper band and stunning patterned Chiyogami paper from Japan in a wider band with chocolate brown ribbon. The pale pink blossoms are on a pale yellow background with chocolate coloured detail. Each blossom is outlined with a subtle pale gold which shimmers in the light and brings a unique quality to the shade.

Made using Chiyogami Paper from Japan. Each sheet is hand silk-screen printed requiring a separate screen that is hand-registered for each colour that appears in a pattern. The technique gives the paper a unique quality, you can sometimes feel and see the different layers of print giving added depth to the pattern.

The inks used on these papers are very light fast and the vibrant colours will last, the paper is also very durable. The shade has seams and hand rolled edges.

Can be used as either a pendant shade with the gold band at the bottom or on a stand which puts the gold band at the top.

name: Golden Cream Floral
description:
MADE TO ORDER

MEDIUM DRUM:  25cm diameter x 20cm high    (10" x 8")

This drum shade is covered using stunning Chiyogami paper from Japan. A floral pattern in pale cream with gold & pale green detail has been hand screen printed onto washi paper. The ink is lightfast and the paper has a matt finish, no synthetic coatings. The gold brings a subtle and unusual addition to the print and the light shines through in varying degrees.

Ideal as either a pendant shade or for a lampbase.

A beautiful shade that has a traditional quality from the screen print technique yet looks wonderful in a contemporary setting.

The production methods to make and print this paper are environmentally sound.

name: Flower Web
description:
Medium Drum Shade 25cm Diameter x 20cm Height
Suitable as a pendant shade or for use on a base.
MADE TO ORDER

The paper used to make this shade is hand stencil dyed Katazome-Shi paper from Japan, the finished edges are hand rolled. The paper is strong, durable and printed with long lasting dyes and features a light and playful design of flowers. The background is a natural undyed paper colour. The design features green and orange with blue and brown highlights.

A beautiful design that could pick out many colours from a room scheme.


Traditional Kimono printing techniques are used to make this hand stencil dyed paper. True craftsmanship is required to create intricate paper stencils cut out with various tools. A resist paste is applied to the base paper and then colour, the stencil moved and the process is repeated to build up the pattern. This a highly labour intensive process that results in a paper that has timeless appeal and an unmissable look of a print made by hand

The shades are made with handrolled edges.

The production methods to make and print this paper are environmentally sound.

   AVAILABLE IN OTHER SIZES - PLEASE EMAIL TO ENQUIRE

name: Blossom Pink
description:
Medium Drum Shade 25cm Diameter x 20cm Height
Suitable as a pendant shade or for use on a base.

The paper used to make this shade is silk screened Chiyogami paper from Japan, the finished edges are hand rolled. The paper is strong, durable and printed with long lasting dyes and features a light and playful design of blossom.

A cream background is printed with dainty pink and red blossom on deep grey branches, with brown and grey dots outlined in gold ink. A beautiful design that would blend well in rooms with accents of these colours.

Each sheet of Chiyogami is hand silk-screen printed requiring a separate screen that is hand-registered for each colour that appears in a pattern. The technique gives the paper a unique quality, you can sometimes feel and see the different layers of print giving added depth to the pattern. When lit the pattern becomes more subtle.

A beautiful shade that has a traditional quality from the screen print technique yet looks wonderful in a contemporary setting.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The shades are made with handrolled edges.

The production methods to make and print this paper are environmentally sound.

   AVAILABLE IN OTHER SIZES - PLEASE EMAIL FOR DETAILS

description:
Small Drum Lamp Shade - 20cm diameter 18cm Height (8" x 7")

Made using beautiful Japanese Katazome-Shi Paper. A strong, light fast paper using navy blue and red inks. The shade has one seam and hand rolled edges.

Traditional Kimono printing techniques are used to make this hand stencil dyed paper. True craftsmanship is required to create intricate paper stencils cut out with various tools. A resist paste is applied to the base paper and then colour, the stencil moved and the process is repeated to build up the pattern. This a highly labour intensive process that results in a paper that has timeless appeal and an unmissable look of a print made by hand

Ideal to use with a table lamp base, bedside lamp base, hallway or bathroom shade.

Chiyogami Papers - each base sheet is hand silk-screen printed requiring a separate screen that is hand-registered for each colour that appears in a pattern. name: Green Spiral Flower
description:
Commission a custom made shade using this beautiful Japanese Katazome-Shi Paper. A strong, light fast paper with a retro edge and bold appearance.
MADE TO ORDER 40cm x 25cm

Strong paper made using a stencil dye technique which is labour intensive and all done by hand.

The paper has large flower patterns on a background of vines and leaves.  A paper with a retro edge and bold appearance.

Traditional Kimono printing techniques are used to make this hand stencil dyed paper. True craftsmanship is required to create intricate paper stencils cut out with various tools. A resist paste is applied to the base paper and then colour, the stencil moved and the process is repeated to build up the pattern. * MEDIUM DRUM:  25cm diameter x 20cm high    (10" x 8")

name: Kongpo Natural
description:
Silk screen design printed in France on Nepalese Lokta paper.
MADE TO ORDER

Background is un-bleached paper, printed with a warm brown ink.

The silk screened pattern is a modern design featuring depictions from nature arranged in a way to create a large scale pattern that is intricate.  An unusual mix of elegant design printed on  textured paper which reveals its fibres when the light is switched on.

Lokta is handmade from the bark of the Lokta, a shrub that grows and foothills of the Himalayas. It is a self regenerating native bast fibre and abundant in supply, thus preserving the fragile ecology of Nepal as well as giving continued work to the many mountain villages who make their living by making the raw paper.  It is a strong, and durable.


   AVAILABLE IN THE FOLLOWING SIZES (made to order)

* LARGE DRUM:     40cm diameter x 20cm high     (15.7" x 8")
* MEDIUM DRUM:  25cm diameter x 20cm high    (10" x 8")
* SMALL DRUM:     20cm diameter x 18cm high    (8" x 7")

Lokta is handmade from the bark of the Lokta, a shrub that grows and foothills of the Himalayas. It is a self regenerating native bast fibre and abundant in supply, thus preserving the fragile ecology of Nepal as well as giving continued work to the many mountain villages who make their living by making the raw paper. name: Olive Print
description:
Handmade Cylinder Lampshade 15cm diameter 23cm height (approx 6" x 9")

Cylinder Shade - suitable as a pendant or with a lamp base

Simple repeat design on Italian paper from Florence. Litho printed on fine Italian paper. The pattern is based on historical wood block printed papers.

The background of this paper is a muted bluey green, the pattern is a lighter green with highlights of white & yellow. The backing of the shade is clear which allows light to diffuse through the shade when it is turned on.

The shade is handmade has one seam and handrolled edges. A really great design that has a traditional, yet contemporary feel.

Suggested use:
- Pendant shade for a bedroom, bathroom or hallway
- Table lamp

name: Tube Lamp  Weave
description:
Simple and  timeless lamps.  This one has a delicate fan design on slightly pearlescent paper.

The lamps stand 50cm tall (12.5cm diameter)

The lamps produce an elegant ambient light, perfect to stand in the corner of a room, a shelf, sideboard or table.  

Your lamp comes complete with inline switch, plug and anti-topple device!
 
Available in a range of delicately patterned white and off white Japanese tissue papers.  

Maximum 40 watt bayonet fitting bulb. Energy saving bulbs are recommended.   The lamps are handmade and manufactured in the UK.
